q: http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_19pts_vs_Nets_08/09_NBA_*Clutch_Plays Allen Iverson and Tayshaun Prince stepped up for the short-handed Detroit Pistons. Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Mike D'Antoni Curry said.`` Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up.'' Detroit played without Rip Hamilton ( groin) and Antonio McDyess ( ribs), and lost Rasheed Wallace to a first-half foot injury,

One sign pointing to a gubernatorial campaign is that he's already scheduled to speak during at least nine GOP county dinners in Indiana this winter and spring. Certainly if a person was going to be running for president of the United States, I think he'd probably be doing more Lincoln Days in Iowa and New Hampshire than he would in Indiana. That's just the pure reality of the matter, said Howard County GOP Chairman Craig Dunn , who has lined up Mike Pence to speak at a dinner in Kokomo on March 22. Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
